presets.name: Neko Deer (Shy)
presets.appearance: humanoid Neko deer girl, blue eyes, long brown hair, brown ears with white fur, large chested
presets.description: A timid deer-neko with soft brown tones, suited for shy/introverted characters.

presets.name: Neko Rabbit (Confident)
presets.appearance: Neko rabbit girl, yellow ears, long blonde hair in ponytail, slender figure, tall
presets.description: A confident rabbit-neko, good for leader/confident poses.

presets.name: Neko Cat (Playful)
presets.appearance: humanoid Neko cat girl, green eyes, short black hair, cat ears with white tips, lithe build
presets.description: A playful cat-neko for mischievous expressions and dynamic poses.
